import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Button, Modal, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' function Example(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const [user, setUser] = useState(props.user) const handleInputChange = (event) => { const { type, value } = event.target setUser({ ...user, [type]: value }) } useEffect(() => { setUser(props.user) }, [props]) return ( <> Modal title
Name Email address Phone Number
); } const UserTable = (props) => ( {props.users.length > 0 ? ( props.users.map((user) => ( )) ) : ( ) }
Name Email Actions
{user.name} {user.email} {user.phone}
No users
) export default UserTable
